faq.title: Technical FAQ
faq.subtitle: Expert answers to your development questions

questions.question: How do you ensure website performance and Core Web Vitals?
questions.answer: We optimize for Core Web Vitals from day one using techniques like code splitting, image optimization, lazy loading, and CDN implementation. We use Lighthouse audits and real user monitoring to maintain 90+ performance scores.

questions.question: What's your approach to scalability and future growth?
questions.answer: We architect with growth in mind using microservices, serverless functions, and database sharding when needed. Our code is modular and documented, making it easy to add features and scale infrastructure as your business grows.

questions.question: How do you handle security and data protection?
questions.answer: Security is built into every layer: HTTPS/SSL encryption, input validation, SQL injection protection, XSS prevention, OWASP compliance, regular security audits, and GDPR-compliant data handling practices.

questions.question: Can you integrate with existing systems and APIs?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in seamless integrations with CRMs, payment processors, analytics tools, marketing platforms, and custom APIs. We ensure data consistency and maintain system reliability during migrations.

questions.question: What's your code quality and testing process?
questions.answer: We follow strict code quality standards with ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript. Our testing includes unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end testing with Playwright/Cypress, and automated CI/CD pipelines for consistent deployments.

questions.question: How do you handle SEO and technical optimization?
questions.answer: We implement technical SEO best practices: semantic HTML, structured data, meta tags, sitemap generation, robots.txt optimization, page speed optimization, and mobile-first indexing compliance.

dataCollection.item3: Financial Data: Financial information, such as data related to your payment method (e.g., valid credit card number, card brand, expiration date) that we may collect when you purchase, order, or request information about our services from the Site
dataCollection.item4: Data From Contests, Giveaways, and Surveys: Personal and other information you may provide when entering contests or giveaways and/or responding to surveys
